devdoc.title: Contract for copyright authorship complaints registration

getComplainer(string).notice: Retrieve the account that made the complaint for the input manifestation hash

getComplaintHash(string).notice: Retrieve the IPFS hash of the complaint content for the input manifestation

makeComplaint(string,string).notice: Register a complaint using the IPFS hash of the complaint content and the hash identifying the manifestation complainted. Just one unexpired complaint for the same manifestation hash allowed

revokeComplaint(string).notice: Remove the complaint for the input manifestation
